casebody.data:
Trendel TUTSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2016 Michael D. Day, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Michele C. Lukban, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Trendel Tutson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 108 , 144 A.3d 519 (2016), is denied.
